metadata.title: CVE-2023-3220 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.1-rc8.dpu_crtc_atomic_check in drivers/gpu/drm/msm/disp/dpu1/dpu_crtc.c lackscheck of the return value of kzalloc() and will cause the NULL PointerDereference.

criterions.comment: linux-aws package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.

linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
